channel.title: Gold Prices on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Gold Prices on FinanClub

item.title: GOLD
item.description: score:13 Chances: Positive Q2 earnings and sales performance for Barrick Gold. Barrick beats profit estimates due to higher gold prices. Progress in extending the value delivery runway for Barrick. Barrick acquires Cascadia stake and explores expansion opportunities. Responsible mining practices having a positive impact on Barrick.

item.title: GFI
item.description: score:9 Chances: Gold Fields reported earnings decline for the first half of the year due to lower volumes sold and higher operating costs. The company’s focus on pursuing growth by building new mines and searching for new gold deposits indicates a strategic approach to expansion.
